entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
